text:
Parole Orders (Transfer) (Corresponding Laws) Amendment Notice 2006

I make the following notice under section 3 of the Parole Orders (Transfer) Act 1983 .

6 September 2006

STEVEN KONS

Minister for Justice and Workplace Relations

1. Short title
    This notice may be cited as the Parole Orders (Transfer) (Corresponding Laws) Amendment Notice 2006 .

2. Commencement
    This notice takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Notice
    In this notice, the Parole Orders (Transfer) (Corresponding Laws) Notice 1984 is referred to as the Principal Notice.

4.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Parole Orders (Transfer) (Corresponding Laws) Notice 1984 .

SCHEDULE 1 - Corresponding Laws

Clause 3

  Column 1 – Law  Column 2 – State or Territory  1.  Crimes (Sentence Administration) Act 2006  Australian Capital Territory  2.  Parole Orders (Transfer) Act 1983  New South Wales  3.  Parole Orders (Transfer) Act 1981  Northern Territory  4.  Parole Orders (Transfer) Act 1984  Queensland  5.  Parole Orders (Transfer) Act, 1983  South Australia  6.  Parole Orders (Transfer) Act 1983  Victoria  7.  Parole Orders (Transfer) Act 1984  Western Australia
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      


Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 13 September 2006

This notice is administered in the Department of Justice.
